result.execSummary:
The defendant Alberto T Diaz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Alberto T Diaz is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Alberto T Diaz was found guilty of Substantial Battery-Intend Bodily Harm [Modifiers: Repeater, Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to all previously imposed sentences.

superMiscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.
++  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
++   Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.
++ Pay restitution plus surcharges & prosecution costs of $2541.00.    If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered. May Not have contact with victims.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Michael Barth.  Victim rights compliance.  Sentencing arguments made.  Deft sentenced to 6yrs WSP consecutive to all previously imposed sentences; initial confinement of 4yrs followed by 2yrs of ES.  See ES conditions.  Deft not eligible for CIP or SAP.
